## 293. NOSE
### Definition
The organ of the human face used to breath and smell. (Concepticon) Should be distinguished from ‘nostrils’, “internal nose” (i. e. internal organs), as well as ‘flair’ or ‘scent’. (GLD)

### Contexts
1. We breathe and smell with the nose. (GLD) 2. Blood is dripping from his nose.
